subject: PGA Championship
Golf
Greenbrier Classic (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Ángel Cabrera won the Greenbrier Classic for his first nonmajor victory on the PGA Tour, closing with his second straight six-under-par 64 for a two-stroke victory over George McNeill.
snippet: Ángel Cabrera won the Greenbrier Classic for his first nonmajor victory on the PGA Tour, closing with his second straight six-under-par 64 for a two-stroke victory over George McNeill.
